about_the_game:
Game Synopsis

Rental is a short, indie horror puzzle game featuring a late 90's video rental store.
During your adventure, you'll hear about a fabled break room that you shouldn't enter, talk to unsettling character's, and experience the uncertainty of this bizarre store.
Complete your shift tasks: put films on the right shelves, toss out the trash, and go home--just don't go in the break room.

Features

  • WASD movement, but no running in the store, please.
  • Simple puzzles: decipher the genre of films and place them on the correct shelves. Rewind tapes as needed.
  • 90's nostalgia pixel art and real-world indie films playing in the game!
  • Monsters who love jellybeans.
  • A thoughtful coworker who will be with you to the end.
  • Approximately 10 minutes of demo gameplay.

name: Rental

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8650U CPU @ 1.90GHz 2.11 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Finish your shift. Ignore the monster. Question your reality.Rental is a short, psychological horror puzzle game demo set in a 90's video rental store. Complete tasks as Jasmine and don't enter the break room!
